Member Function Documentation

FfsTestThreadlet * FfsTestThreadlet::CreateInstance (  FfsTestDispWin *  dispWin  )  [static]
 

Creates an FFS threadlet and releases itself automatically after the threadlet has been executed.

INT FfsTestThreadlet::Fn (   )  [virtual]
 

Fn is the function that will be executed in thread context. Be aware of restrictions to operations that can be performed in thread context.

Implements Threadlet.

void FfsTestThreadlet::ReleaseInstance (   )  [virtual]
 

Is invoked, when the threadlet has the permission to destroy itself. Per default nothing is done. Overwriting this method is useful, if a derived class offers a static method CreateInstance, which internally allocates an instance on the heap, so that in ReleaseInstance this instance might be deleted. This releases the application, which created a worker-thread, to taking care about releasing the threadlet by listening to the message ThreadletNotificationMsg.

Reimplemented from Threadlet.
